title: What are man-made disasters that are preventable? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are we talking disasters that happened that could’ve been prevented or disasters that could happen that are preventable? Don’t answer that because it doesn’t matter… Every man-made disaster is preventable, even if we haven’t found a way to prevent it yet. Nuclear Wars can be prevented by getting rid of the nukes or maintaining good healthy relationships all around the world. Global Warming can supposedly be prevented by making Carbon Dioxide the world’s number 1 enemy. Every physical war can be prevented by using our words rather than guns and violence to fight. Literally every disaster created by mankind and every disaster that mankind could possibly cause/create can be prevented.
